item.title: Time Blind Ai
item.author: David Wicks
item.description:
The Curious Case of the Time-Blind AI: Lessons from Building an elevenlabs Agent

Large language models (LLMs) are amazing, but they have a funny quirk: they don’t really understand the passage of time within a conversation. This became super clear when we were building an AI agent with elevenLabs. You can learn more about their product here: elevenlabs conversational AI agents. In a nutshell its an LLM linked with a realistic chat bot.

item.title: Hello World

item.description:
Introduction

This is my first post. This is gonna be fun. I can’t wait to build more!
